com.anifichadia.toolkit.file

Class J6FileOperations

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.anifichadia.toolkit.file.J6FileOperations
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    J7FileOperations

    public class J6FileOperations
extends java.lang.Object
    Collection of File Operations compatible with Java 6.

    Note: Documentation and refinements pending completion
    Author:
    Aniruddh Fichadia | Email: Ani.Fichadia@gmail.com | GitHub Username: AniFichadia (http://github.com/AniFichadia)
